job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core software engineering task of incorporating AI capabilities into the application's architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This describes the fundamental software development activities of designing and building applications, including both front-end and back-end aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: The focus is on using AI technologies (LLMs) to create features within applications, which is an integration task within the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'applying the latest advancements... to our platform' refers to the practical implementation of new technologies within the existing software, a core development task.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the importance of integrating different components (front-end, back-end, AI) to build robust and scalable software.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of the primary task: developing and delivering applications that are powered by AI.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the role's responsibility to align technical solutions with business needs and strategic goals (setting new standards).

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible
job_tasks.justification: Similar to the above, this emphasizes understanding user needs and driving innovation within the business context.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts
Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success
Take ownership of the entire development process
push the boundaries of what's possible
continually learning and applying the latest advancements
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products

profile.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on software development tasks (architecting, coding, integrating front-end and back-end systems) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it involves working with cutting-edge AI technologies like LLMs (GPT-4, Claude), the emphasis is on integrating these into applications to create features, rather than developing or fine-tuning the models themselves (Macro-Category B). This aligns with the definition of an 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' as a role that builds software integrating AI/ML features.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, with a strong alignment between the listed responsibilities and the defined profiles. The distinction between what they 'will' and 'will not' do further clarifies the scope, and the technologies mentioned are specific.
